# Ink - Next.js Ebook Website

## Project Overview
Modern ebook platform website with orange color theme and GSAP scroll animations.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform)
